import React from "react"; import "./style.css"; import Navbar from "../../Navbar"; import Footer from "../../Footer"; class AddStartUp extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { name: "", logo: "", mail: "", description: "", web: "", twitter: "", instagram: "", }; } handleInputChange(event) { const name = event.target.name; const value = event.target.value; this.setState( { [name]: value, }, () => { console.log(this.state); } ); } render() { return (
this.handleInputChange(e)} >
